name: 涂淑惠
objective: 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：1. 交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，2. 三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，3. 變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，4. 頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，5. Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，6. Laplace轉換及應用。
schedule:
w1. Sinusoidal Waves and Frequency Domain
w2. Frequency-Domain Analysis
       Sinusoidal Steady-State
w3. Impedance Transformer
w4. Power and Energy of Alternative Circuits
       Effective Value of Sinusoidal Waves
w5. Active Power and Reactive Power
       Apparent Power and Complex Power
w6. Power Matching
w7. Mutual Inductance and Transformer
       Ideal Transformer
       Unit Couple Coils
w8. Complex Frequency Domain
       Poles and Zeros
       Stability of Circuit Systems
w9. Mid-term
w10. Frequency Response Curves
        Amplitude Frequency Responses
w11. Phase Frequency Responses
w12. Series RLC Resonant Circuits
w13. Parallel RLC Resonant Circuits
w14. Two-Port Networks
         Immittance Parameters
         Hybrid Parameters
         Transmission Parameters
w15. Series Interconnection
         Parallel Interconnection
w16. Laplace Transform Analysis
w17. Three-Phase Balance Circuits
w18. Final
materials:
1. Electric Circuits (10th edition) by James W. Nilsson and Susan A. Riedel
2. Fundamentals of Electric Circuits (6th edition) by Christopher. K. Alexander and Matthew N.O. Sadiku
